article: What do the people usually do on the weekend? People like to stay at home, but others like to _ out for a walk or play football. Mr. Smith _ hard in a post office during the _ . But on the weekend, he usually _ the same thing. On Saturday he washes his car and on _ he goes with his family to a village by car. His uncle and aunt _ on a farm there. It isn't a big one, but there is always _ to do on the farm. The children help with the animals and give them some _ . Mr. and Mrs. Smith help in the field . At 5:00p.m., they are all  _ , so Mr. Smith's aunt _ them a big dinner. And then they go home by car.
